page.title: 12 Bruckland farm
page.content: The farm house is very old and used to be part of Rousden Estate. They made a few fields larger by pulling up hedges.Edge Hill was called Edge Hill because it is the of a hill. The farmhouse is about 400 years old.There is a new shed and parlour and a new beef unit this year.Most of the buildings are as old as the farmhouse. They use the buildings for cows and for stock.The breeds of cows the farm has are Friesians and Ayrshines. The cows are milked at the same time. Some of the cows go to the cattle market to be sold. The breeds of pigs the farm has got are the Saddleback and Londrace.There are pet pigs for family pigs.
